Reviews.Title: my first smartphone
Reviews.Author: Asphaltgal
Reviews.Content: was not willing to be locked in a 2 year contract with Verizon, so I decided to look for a good used Droid (did not want an Iphone either)  I have had this phone for 2 weeks I really like it.  I am getting used to it being bigger than the env touch and not having a qwerty board.  I am also still learning to use the phone, no manual came with it.  My son had one like this so he has been helpful.  I am very pleased with this purchase.  So if you don't have to have the newest out I suggest you give this one a try.

Reviews.Title: Good deal...
Reviews.Author: Guster
Reviews.Content: Received product as described in a timely fashion, everything that was promised was included so I am happy. It appeared to be brand new in box and described accessories came with it.

Reviews.Title: jjh
Reviews.Author: jjh
Reviews.Content: This phone did not last more than a week. Sent it back and got my money back. Would not buy used again.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Eshu "Eshu"
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my daughter after hers was stolen, it was $129.99 new and allowed me to keep my unlimited data plan, plus my daughter loves it.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone!
Reviews.Author: B. Joice "Amazon lover"
Reviews.Content: I needed a new phone after my Droid Bionic took a swim in a lake.  This is a nice replacement phone for me to use until I can upgrade again next year.

Reviews.Title: it`s a great phone
Reviews.Author: mark
Reviews.Content: the only thing missing is a front camera . best phone that i have owned thus far would definitely reommend

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Laci Bergeron
Reviews.Content: Bought for husband. Works very well he really likes it . Glad we chose this phone. Love the features that it has!

Reviews.Title: NICE!!
Reviews.Author: Eric Webb
Reviews.Content: Brand new just like I wanted! Thanks!A W E S O M E ! ! ! ! ! !

Reviews.Title: Wasn't New
Reviews.Author: netty98
Reviews.Content: When I recieved the phone I had to delete all the info from the memory. If your going to sell something at least reset all the data to the factory setting...... big give a way that its been used more that a couple of times........ just saying

Reviews.Title: Droid X
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This Droid X appeared in excellent contition upon arrival but died after two months! Do not buy this procuct, please!

Reviews.Title: It is fine.
Reviews.Author: TAOFENG
Reviews.Content: I got this cell phone on time and it works well so far.What I give this rate is that this cell is not a brand new as I expected. Actually, I sent message to ask before order it, and got a answer that it is a brand new one. However, when I received it, I found several evidence that it is a used one or refurbished one. For example,  (1) There are tiny two scratches on the flash light and one the frame;  (2) The left up corner of the body has surface fatigue.  (3)  Also, I can found some pictures in the installed 2G micro Memory card. I guess that she must be the previous holder of this cell phone.Since it work well and it is not expensive, it is not deserve to return. But I would like to suggest the prompte the quality of service in the future. About this cell phone, I would like to say this type of Motorola cell phone is good enough with this price. The 8M camera is a competitive point for selling although the speed of taking picture is lower than my previous 955. The screen is large out of my imagination. If it also has touch functional button as 955, it will be very great. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: great!
Reviews.Author: C. Loder "bookworm"
Reviews.Content: Came at a good time since it was too soon to upgrade. Was surprised by the buttons for home,back etc. At least I can now call some one. I love that it came ready to activated with one call. I have activated the voice to announce when a call comes in. I find it a big help when I'm trying to sleep, and not have to reach over to check.

Reviews.Title: Love my DroidX
Reviews.Author: Batman
Reviews.Content: Great phone. This is my first smart phone and i love it.Battery life could be better but its a smart phone, what do you expect.Its not the fastest but not the slowest either.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Beth Haun
Reviews.Content: Was needing replacement phone..this one will do.. it was used so some signs of wear but satisfactory.. Definitely satisfied with this!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Seller...Very pleased!!
Reviews.Author: Patricia A Franks
Reviews.Content: The phone arrived quickly in excellent wrap. It appeared in new condition and with the seller all thumbs up!!  I omitted the 5th star in case buyers are choosing between this phone and something else strictly by the stars.  I ordered this phone for my 15yr old grandson.I purchased one for myself some months ago and was thrilled with it.  I have since been having issues with various items and have heard they are typical of this particular model. The problems are more annoying than critical, ie occasionally freezing, too unstable to use if plugged in, etc. Patience and resets usually take care of it and the price is awsome. For a first smart phone,  or for an absent-minded teen, this is perfect and its quite user friendly.

Reviews.Title: what i like is what i got!
Reviews.Content: Great phone  and fits my need for my home business and officefeatures all my needs in general the camera is fantastic the other features are also greati got a like new condition and looks absolutely new why shop a new one? this is a great gift not a problem at all works fantastic

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: Terri Sadler
Reviews.Content: The phone was in get shape and the car and house chargers was nice! So thank you very much! I love the phone.

Reviews.Title: Bad Battery
Reviews.Author: chris
Reviews.Content: The battery was no good it was fried I will not buy from here no more it said it was in working order, and it was not the battery was no good so I had to buy a battery for it that cost 60.00 dollars for the battery.

Reviews.Title: My first smartphone journey-not pleasant
Reviews.Author: An AMAZON fan
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone a few months ago so my review comes after I "lived" with the phone quite some time.This was my first smartphone. In the beginning I was happy with it. The problems started later. The battery cover keeps on falling off, the battery life is very short and when typing, the keys just freeze. For whatever reason, the phone decides to reboot once in a while. (could not figure out why) It takes time till the camera reminds itself that you ordered its service and by the time its up-and-running, my baby crawled away.I had contacted the seller and they sent me a new battery cover. When I complained about the short battery life, they offered a replacement phone. They kept on repeating I should not leave bad reviews so I held back. But by now I decided to write one because I don't want people should be fooled into buying this phone.Although this is one of the cheaper smartphones out there, it pays to spend that extra money for a better phone.Good luck!!(I know its very hard to make a decision with so many choices and peoples reviews)

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: Pammy
Reviews.Content: This is my 1st smart phone.  Is user friendly &  I really like the size of the screen!...not too big or too small.

Reviews.Title: liers, not new!!!
Reviews.Author: shoppertab
Reviews.Content: I bought a phone that was advertised as new and it wasnt because it was rooted and had way more files on it then my first "NEW" droid X.  They have false advertising and would not buy from again!

Reviews.Title: Excellent choice
Reviews.Author: MICHAEL R DYSON
Reviews.Content: This is a great phone to have. I purchased 2 and enjoyed the features of this phone. However, one of the phones couldn't be activated so I had to return both. Overall, I had no problems sending the phones back and I was able to receive my full refund. I received great customer service.

Reviews.Title: dud
Reviews.Author: anna
Reviews.Content: Why i dont really like it cause it keeps shutting off on me and dies fast but the middle of sreen was starting to go.next time ill buy a new phone.

Reviews.Title: Worried about the quality of the phone
Reviews.Author: Jane
Reviews.Content: I was thrill when the phone arrived. This is my first smart phone. The quality just doesn't seem to be in phone and reading other's reviews; I wonder if it is a new phone. What I purchased described it as new. There are times when I make a call that the phone will not end the call. There is also a noise inside the phone like something is loose. I don't think this is a good quality product. I have been to Verizon and they ask what I paid for the phone? A $100.00. Again I am worried how long this thing will last.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: reed
Reviews.Content: I received this phone on date, it is everything they said it was. My boyfriend is very happy with this phone.

Reviews.Title: good deal
Reviews.Author: Douglas
Reviews.Content: set this phone up with Verizon prepaid works good, dose the typical weird android things.  only thing is the battery life is not that great, and  I know its a smart phone I have owned several and there are several things that affect battery life, I would recommend this phone .

Reviews.Title: Not worth the money
Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: Did not like this phone due to the quality. Definitely not worth the price.  It is a "knockoff" compared to the one you would get with your wireless carrier. The reception with it isnt great either (I have verizon and have never had a problem with reception with any phone that I got with my upgrades). It does its job but thats it. The picture quality is horrible. I had better picture quality when the first camera phone ever came out.  If i didnt need a phone I would have returned it after day 1.

Reviews.Title: Better than I hoped for
Reviews.Author: Adam
Reviews.Content: The droid came In a shipping box but had lots of packing and  was in good shape looks new works great will see how it works out I'm in love.The phone does more than they show on youtube heheheheh if this one goes badI will get another one nice big screen to.

Reviews.Title: The phone received was good
Reviews.Author: Ragu
Reviews.Content: The phone received was good. Only only point of discomfort was that it did not have SD card in it. I was not told that this will not have SD card.ThanksRagu

Reviews.Title: Be careful
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: Although the picture associated with this phone says NEW, the phone was used. I bought it as a backup phone, so the cosmetic condition was not that important to me. The phone does function despite a button that sticks. Just wanted to make sure others knew it was not a NEW phone.

Reviews.Title: Not what i expected but still good
Reviews.Author: LaTanya Wright
Reviews.Content: It works fine excluding a one of the buttons sticks. For it to be NEW it has alot of scratches on it... Just saying, It is supposed to be NEW!!!

Reviews.Title: Fair
Reviews.Author: jzRios005
Reviews.Content: The phone is ok. I had Droid RAZR Maxx, but it broke and had to buy a replacement. It's not as great as the Maxx, which has better reception and features like 4G. But it's still a good phone and gets the job done.

Reviews.Title: Takes great photos
Reviews.Author: Yanni
Reviews.Content: This phone works just as stated in the description.  The 8MP camera is one of the features that I wanted and it takes great photos.

Reviews.Title: Good phone!
Reviews.Author: lori
Reviews.Content: This phone has held up. It is very user friendly. My husband was pleased with the purchase. Our first Motorola purchase. Very pleased!

Reviews.Title: droid x
Reviews.Content: It does everything I need it to do.nice big screen. Does drain the battery faster than I like it to

Reviews.Title: love
Reviews.Author: MistOfRain "MistOfRain"
Reviews.Content: what can i say? i love the droid. it is very duriable. mine was dropped a lot and kept on working. i'd buy again and again.

Reviews.Title: new but defective
Reviews.Author: blondy768
Reviews.Content: I received my phone and there is a black spot in the screen...I didn't contact the sellers because I was in desperate need of the phone and couldn't go through sending it back and waiting on a new one...nor the expense of sending it back, shipping a new one and another activation fee....I worked at a cell phone store before so I am certain I did receive a new phone...unfortunately it was one that didn't go back to Verizon for defects...it was sold for $100 on amazon to me....good price...you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Good Phone For the Most Part
Reviews.Author: Kathleen
Reviews.Content: This phone was alright, but not the best. The camera quality was not a great as I was expecting, especially since it was advertised as a camera phone. It's also a lot slower than the other phones I had too. After using it for awhile, the charge port ended up breaking and I had to get another phone, so it was worthless almost.This phone is a good replacement if your phone suddenly breaks, but the best replacement I found are the HTC older edition smartphones. They have better cameras and they're much faster.

Reviews.Title: droid x replacement
Reviews.Author: Brian R. Kuntz
Reviews.Content: Purchased this as my droid died and I am not about to renew my contract with Verizon - I want out from under them.  When I looked at the price to purchase a smart phone without contract I had to catch my breath.  This phone will hopefully get me through the rest of  my dreadful contract with Verizon.  I was disapointed as I expected a battery to come with it and the batteries that I have from my two previous phones( I have three) don't fit this version of droid so I guess I'm going to be out another 40-50 dollars to buy one. Checking the details of the phone after I got it today and it doesn't mention the battery as included but it would be nice if they made a point to point that out. They supplied a charger and I have more chargers for the droid than I know what to do with.

Reviews.Title: wonderful company but dissapointed in the phone itself
Reviews.Author: Leslie Shepard
Reviews.Content: Well, the phone was wonderful for about a week, then I started getting pixel lines all over the screen. No impact to it or anything, but i didn't have a cover on it so who knows. But the company was wonderful and went out of their way to work with me and gave me a full refund in the end. I would recommend this company.

Reviews.Title: nice phone
Reviews.Author: molveira
Reviews.Content: This phone is very easy to use and I like the way it feels in my hand (weight/size). The only thing that annoys me is that when I talk, it is easy to hit the MUTE button with my chin. This can be solved by clicking on your home page after making a call. I also did not receive the instruction booklet in the box with the phone, but the box was sealed and the phone is clearly new and works fine. I downloaded the booklet from online.

Reviews.Title: crappy Phone
Reviews.Author: Brandon
Reviews.Content: My prev ohone from Verizin had gotten water damage. I wasnt near upgrade so being that im a frequent shopping of Amazin.com I found DriodMX810 I didnt want reburbused phone even though they were iffer for cheaoer price I decided i wanted NEW phone so paid to higher cost plus extra $9 for speed shipping. They phone IS NOT NEW the battery doesny charge past %30, in charge all night and on %5u nxt morning. Love this website/company but they Dealer sucks and used Amazon to false advertise a NEW phone

Reviews.Title: cost to much
Reviews.Author: Matthew Belgen
Reviews.Content: Why should i pay over a hundred dollars for a cell phone that i only payeed $29.00 2and years ago for the same NEW phone without a contract phone only!!!

ProductInfo.Features:
Mode: CDMA 850 / 1900
Connectivity: USB, Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, Mobile Hotspot.
Camera: Resolution: 8+ megapixel auto-focus, dual LED flash, mechanical shutter with 1/1000-second shutter speed, touch-to-focus, panorama mode.
4.3" Capacitive Touch Screen.
Music Player with FM radio and 3.5mm headphone jack.
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola DROID X Android Verizon Cell Phone
